con:request.name: Req2
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v4.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddAchToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZip}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:DefaultToken>false</acr2:DefaultToken> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:ABANumber>${Req1#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v4.Common.Responses'; //tem:GenerateCheckCryptoTokenResponse[1]/tem:GenerateCheckCryptoTokenResult[1]/acr1:CryptoToken[1]}</acr2:ABANumber>\r <acr2:AccountNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:AccountType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CheckType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:City xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:FirstName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:LastName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:Phone xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:State xsi:nil="true" /> </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddAchToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
